personal_info.name: Prajwal Shetti
personal_info.description_about_me: I'm a full-stack developer passionate about building innovative web applications and digital experiences

projects.project_description: Offline attendance taking system for rural schools, Efficient student performance tracking with parent involvement, Dynamic time table creation and exam creation.
Built a project for the NGO INDUS-ACTION, Web platform that efficiently conveys government policies to rural beneficiaries.
1v1 Spaceship shootout game, Developed an engaging 1v1 spaceship shootout game.
E-commerce platform, WebSocket-enabled authenticated e-commerce website.

experience.my_role_desc: Developed a web application to streamline NGO operations, enhancing beneficiary tracking and policy implementation. Built a secure, efficient backend with Node.js and Express, improving data management and reporting

Developed a website to assist teachers and administrators, reducing their workload by streamlining operations and beneficiary tracking. Built a secure backend with Node.js and Express, improving data management and reporting.
Demonstrated strong chess skills by competing and winning at the state level.
Secured 5th rank in Karnataka 10th board exams, showcasing strong analytical skills, dedication, and academic excellence.
